tool.name: M.tb VCF Report
tool.description: Annotate SnpEff VCF with links to Combat TB Explorer database
tool.command: ln -s '$input_vcf' data.vcf && tbvcfreport generate #if str($tbprofiler.use_tbp) == "yes" --tbprofiler_report '$tbprofiler_json' #end if '$input_json' data.vcf && mv data.html '$output' #if str($tbprofiler.use_tbp) == "yes" mv data_drug_resistance.html '$drug_resistance_report' #endif
tool.help: This tool generates an HTML-based VCF report from an input SnpEff VCF file. The input has to be a SnpEff generated VCF file.
